column4: i accidently screwed up when i was making an eggbot so now when i start ./eggdrop it starts eggdrop+conf1 however if u want to load conf2 u need 2 enter ./eggdrop conf2 but then i starts the egg w. conf1 becuse those are linked or something, howto fix?
